Boise_City.Concordia University School of Law: Concordia University School of Law is a private, non-profit, ABA Provisionally Approved law school which opened in August 2012 in Boise in the U.S. state of Idaho. Announced in 2007, the school originally planned to open in fall 2011. The first class had 75 students and the school expects to grow to 250 students when fully operational.
